li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-has-children menu-item-493 msm-top-level-item

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1490005716471 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

div.h6: Athlos Academy is a unique public charter school that prepares students for success in three ways.

div.p: The Prepared Mind Pillar is centered on academic programs that will prime students with the knowledge and critical thinking skills they need to excel.

img.alt: Healthy Body - kettlebells in weight room

div.p: The Healthy Body Pillar allows students of all athletic abilities to participate in professionally developed, age-appropriate fitness curriculum.
The Performance Character Pillar is the foundation of school culture and promotes 12 key character traits.

div.a: READY TO MOVE, READY TO LEARN!

div.p: Teacher Appreciation Week is May 4–8! There is a custom Zoom background available for students to download this week as well as some coloring sheets to show appreciation for Athlos teacher/s!
